c74object.name: teabox~
c74object.digest: A non-bandlimited sawtooth oscillator (a phasor~ in MSP parlance)
c74object.description: A non-bandlimited sawtooth oscillator (a phasor~ in MSP parlance).This sawtooth waveis typically used as a control signal for phase ramping.
